ygData.msgSnippet: In the words of a certain Gambler ... You gotta know when to hold em and know when to fold em. I died three times this past Saturday because I didn t
ygData.messageBody:
In the words of a certain "Gambler"...

"You gotta know when to hold 'em and know when to fold 'em."

I died three times this past Saturday because I didn't "fold 'em" soon
enough.

Tomerrilin

-----Original Message-----
From: Bill Costlow [mailto:atlatyl@...]
Sent: Wednesday, August 09, 2000 9:20 AM
To: eqbards@egroups.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Guise


My experience has run full spectrum. Some of my best
friends on Rodcet Nife are from pickup groups...one

*snip*

On the other hand, I've seen some really bad things
too.

*snip*

--- "Kevin L. Crawford" <Lyrnia@...> wrote:

> I still don't understand how you have so many
> problems with Pickup groups?

*snip*

> learn new tactics to go
> with other people who you aren't used to grouping
> with. Maybe I just adapt
> on the fly better. Maybe you just have some really
